Method Detail

StateChange

public bool StateChange( int& key_, int& state_ );
Controls the passing of state changes for the keyboard keys.
Parameters:
key_ - The keyboard key the state change is being reported for.
state_ - The new state of the button. 1 for pressed, 0 for not pressed.
Returns:
true if a key's state has changed, false otherwise.
